titles.title: At the Lamb's High Feast We sing

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: At the Lamb's high feast we sing praise to our victorious King, who hath washed us in the tide flowing from His pierc√®d side; praise we Him whose love divine gives His sacred blood for wine, gives His body for the feast, Christ the Victim, Christ the Priest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Where the paschal blood is poured, death's dark angel sheathes his sword; Israel's hosts triumphant go through the wave that drowns the foe. Praise we Him, whose blood was shed, Paschal Victim, Paschal Bread; with sincerity and love eat we manna from above.

verse.name: v3
